cast.overview: As the gang return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they discover that nothing is as they expect. The players will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored in order to escape the world’s most dangerous game.
cast.title: Jumanji: The Next Level

details.biography:
Lucy Chet DeVito (born March 11, 1983) is an American actress. She was a recurring character on ABC Family's Melissa & Joey (2010–2012), starred in the Hulu sitcom Deadbeat (2014–2015), and was a main voice actor and executive producer of the FXX animated comedy Little Demon (2022). DeVito has appeared in several theatre productions, including her Broadway debut, I Need That (2023). Since 2007, she has been a member of the New York developmental theatre company Ensemble Studio Theater.

She is the daughter of actor Danny DeVito and actress Rhea Perlman.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Lucy DeVito, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Lucy DeVito
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
